feed.title: Marcus Cvjeticanin - other
feed.subtitle: Software Engineer specialized in backend systems. Java, Kotlin, JVM, CI/CD, Concurrency, Distributed Systems, Decentralized Systems.

entry.title: Welcome to my new blog!
entry.summary: Welcome to my new blog! In this newly styled (self hosted) blog will I cover a range of topics but mainly the Java ecosystem with the language, JVM, tooling and much more. I will try to migrate over my older articles from Medium to this place incrementally. Stay tuned for more!

entry.title: Let‚Äôs Encrypt your site with NGINX
entry.summary: Since Google made the change to its ranking system for sites who use HTTPS instead of HTTP, finally websites started going over to the encrypted protocol. But instead of buying expensive certificates Let‚Äôs Encrypt solves this problem for us at zero cost.
